original_text: Very truly I tell you, no servant is greater than his master, nor is a messenger greater than the one who sent him.
korean_text: 내가 진실로 진실로 너희에게 이르노니 종이 주인보다 크지 못하고 보냄을 받은 자가 보낸 자보다 크지 못하나니

sentences.original_text: no servant is greater than his master
nor is a messenger greater than the one who sent him
sentences.korean_translation: 보낸 자보다 사자가 큰 자가 아니니라
